answers.answer: Thyroid medication does not cause diabetes.Being too hypo, heavy weight, poor nutrition, genetics and being autoimmune are more suspects to diabetes.If we are autoimmune (thyroid/Hashi) makes us more prone than the normal population to another autoimmune conditions (such as diabetes).

question: i just got to know that tablets taken for hypotyroid treatment can cause diabetes after few years..is it true? please help me to know the right information. thank you !
title: sideeffects of tablets taken for treatment of hypotyroid
